scenarios.label: UCLA CPT Internship
scenarios.intent: I am an F-1 student at UCLA and just accepted a summer internship while I am still enrolled. I need help with CPT paperwork and advisor preparation.

scenarios.label: Cornell Initial OPT
scenarios.intent: I am graduating from Cornell this term and want to prepare my initial OPT application and I-765 checklist.

scenarios.label: Duke Cap Gap Transition
scenarios.intent: I am on STEM OPT at Duke and my employer filed H-1B. I need a clear transition prep workflow and advisor handoff packet.

scenarios.label: UCB CPT vs OPT (Ambiguous)
scenarios.intent: I got an internship at UCB and I am confused whether this should be CPT or OPT. I need help deciding the right path.

scenarios.label: Yale STEM OPT Extension
scenarios.intent: I graduated from Yale and I am on OPT with a job offer. I need a structured plan for STEM OPT extension preparation.
